channel.title: Change what's pvp drops and real drops on pur3scape 525 source
channel.description: okay im changing home to varrock bank and right outside is pvp where you lose stuff but i want it to be the keep your stuff and get random drop and i can't figure out how to do it

item.title: Change what's pvp drops and real drops on pur3scape 525 source
item.dc:creator: @hoopdude75 hoopdude75
item.description:
@hoopdude75 wrote:

i just wan’t the pvp drops in one area and there are pvp areas and real drops areas and i want to change 1 real drop area to pvp drop area

Read full topic

item.title: Change what's pvp drops and real drops on pur3scape 525 source
item.dc:creator: @Projext Projext
item.description:
@Projext wrote:

in the Player class, search for applyDeadIn that void, there is another one called loseStuff();If you remove that you will keep your items. If you need any more help, please post.

Read full topic
